title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with frequent braking.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly in a busy city street with many other cars and pedestrians.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.5 m/s). There are 10 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to ensure safety and avoid collisions with other vehicles or pedestrians. It slows down or brakes frequently when approaching intersections or when other cars or pedestrians are nearby. The driver is being cautious and following the traffic rules to maintain a safe driving environment.
